title: Mathematics of the honeycomb
creator_credit: Moody Institute of Science. Educational Film Division
brief_description: Explains the place of mathematics in engineering and the sciences as evidenced by the application of modern mathematical methods to the honeycomb problem. Includes close-up scenes of bees exuding and manipulating wax.
